name: HALO Capital Group
overview:
HALO Capital Group is a central Indiana based seed funding organization. We are a formal group of more than 20 former and current executives who are interested in investing their time and money into new, cutting edge, startup companies. We have collectively seeded dozens of companies. HALO members have founded companies and been senior executives at Fortune 500 companies.

HALO meets every other month to formally consider two startups selected plans that are screened each month by the Halo deal selection process. Entrepreneurs can expect a thorough examination and, occasionally, an investment from some of central Indiana’s most accomplished entrepreneurs.
